external_games.name: 幻想三國誌-天元異事錄

name: Fantasia Sango Mysteria
storyline:
It was the fifth year of Zhongping, and although the Yellow Turbans were flat, the chaos was still there, and the turmoil continued.

Zanghualou secret spy Fu Ce and Lianshan Pavilion Gaozu Qiaofang, under the order of Shangshu Lu Zhi, went to Qiao County to recover the lost books of the Yellow Turban Army.

From this, the young man set foot on the vast land of China and opened a new chapter in the legend!

We will follow Fuze on his adventures and witness the mythical truth hidden behind the history with our own eyes.

You will also encounter countless unique characters, such as brotherhood, confidantes, enemies of fate, heroes and heroes, and a few of the world's most romantic, who will be my generation!

Is this unexpected journey a fateful cause and effect that has been entangled in several lifetimes? Or is it someone's push?

Like countless legends, youth travel, adventures, encounters, and then—

The twists and turns of the plot, the unpredictable ending, look forward to the day when it will be revealed!
summary:
*** This Game is only available in Chinese ***

A brand new chapter in the Fantasy Three Kingdoms series, once again experiencing the coexistence of human beings, gods, demons and monsters, and a world where reality and reality are intertwined.
